effects.name: PENETRATE_SHIELD
PENETRATE_SHIELD
CAPTURE
effects.script:
func on_attack(target):
					var card = Main.cards[self.enemy][target]
					card.structure -= max(card.shield-self.damage,0)
					if (card.structure+card.shield-self.damage<=0):
						var timer = Timer.new()
						var tpos = card.node.get_global_position()
						var new
						Main.destroy_unit(self.position,self.owner,false)
						Main.add_unit(self.position,card.type,owner)
						new = Main.cards[self.owner][position]
						new.structure = card.structure
						new.damage = card.damage
						new.shield = card.shield
						new.attack_points = 0
						new.movement_points = 0
						new.update()
						Main.destroy_unit(target,self.enemy,false)
						timer.set_one_shot(true)
						timer.set_wait_time(1.0)
						add_child(timer)
						timer.start()
						yield(timer,'timeout')
						new.node.set_global_position(tpos)

effects.name: JAM_1
effects.script:
func on_use(target):
				var card = Main.cards[self.enemy][target]
				card.shield = max(card.shield-1,0)
				card.update()
				card.node.add_child(load('res://scenes/effects/jam_shield.tscn').instance())
